resources.string: Sudoku is played on a grid of 9 x 9 spaces. Within the rows and columns are 9 “squares” (made up of 3 x 3 spaces). Each row, column and square (9 spaces each) needs to be filled out with the numbers 1-9, without repeating any numbers within the row, column or square.
Turn on Fast mode to solve by touching a cell in the grid and must select the number first
Turn on Pencil mode to add and remove notes in a cell
